original_text: In the day shalt thou make thy plant to grow, and in the morning shalt thou make thy seed to flourish: but the harvest shall be a heap in the day of grief and of desperate sorrow.
korean_text: 네가 심는 날에 울타리를 두르고 아침에 네 씨가 잘 발육하도록 하였으나 근심과 심한 슬픔의 날에 농작물이 없어지리라

sentences.original_text: In the day shalt thou make thy plant to grow
and in the morning shalt thou make thy seed to flourish
but the harvest shall be a heap
in the day of grief and of desperate sorrow
